name: 2D Shooter (Haydarcancoskun92)
description:
This is a 2D Shooter game project from Game Design and Development 1: 2D Shooter course on Coursera. I added some properties to the original project

Level Design

First Level is the simplest level

The second level is the bigger version of the first level

The third level is totally different and difficult level.

Main Menu

I added some background to the main menu. I added the particle system to obtain the moving stars effect so that I obtained dynamic background. 

Credits

Created by Brian Winn, Modified by Haydar Can Coşkun
